document.full_text: egyptian prime minister essam sharaf will make his first trip abroad next week to sudan, where he is expected to discuss river nile water sharing deals and south sudan's secession, the cabinet said on wednesday.
document.title: egypt pm plans first trip abroad to neighbor sudan
lines_and_colors: egyptian prime minister essam sharaf will make his first trip abroad next week to sudan, where he is expected to discuss river nile water sharing deals and south sudan's secession, the cabinet said on wednesday.
